    • Method Detail

      • GetLocation

        public static Float[] GetLocation​(Float... distances)
        Get position method. This method get the position of the source with the next expression With pitagoras theorem, we can represent the distance with each satelite of the next equation system (a) (x-x1)²+(y-y1)²=d1² (b) (x-x2)²+(y-y2)²=d2² (c) (x-x3)²+(y-y3)²=d3² If expand each equation and subtract (a)-(b) and (b)-(c) we will get two equation with the next structure (1) Ax+ By = C (2) Dx + Ey = F as result: x=(CE−FB)/(EA−BD) y=(CD−AF)/(BD−AE) with the previous system, we can get X and Y
        Parameters:
        distances - array with distance between source and each satelite
        Returns:
        Float array with coordinates

      • GetMessage

        public static String GetMessage​(String[]... messages)
        To recovered message process. First check size of parameter array, if this length is less than 3 return null Remove all empty String in the start arrays. Put empty String in the shorter arrays until all array has the same length. Iterate all arrays and compare the words in each array, if the word is not empty, concatenates it in the String response. If the response String isn't empty, add blank space before concatenates the word In the end of iteration, the response String contain the message
        Parameters:
        messages - array of String arrays with words that each satelite received
        Returns:
        String with recovered message
